output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, though this doesn't automatically disqualify it as electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly refers to "Marcel Ciolacu" as presidential candidate, positioning him and promoting his candidacy for president.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement targeting a potential audience of 100,001-500,000 people.
4. Electoral objective: Clearly yes. The post is explicitly titled "De ce îl votează românii pe Marcel Ciolacu ca președinte al României" and promotes his candidacy with specific points aimed at convincing people to vote for him.
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content. It's purely promotional material listing reasons to vote for the candidate.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured, paid advertisement from "Infomed Pro SRL" promoting a presidential candidate.
This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - It directly promotes a presidential candidate - Has clear electoral objectives - Is paid advertising reaching a wide audience - Lists specific reasons why people should vote for the candidate - Is running after the end of the legal campaign period

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: 1. It explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu as presidential candidate 2. Uses paid advertising to reach a wide audience 3. Has clear electoral messaging 4. Is not journalistic or personal opinion content 5. Running after campaign period ended
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea campaniei electorale, respectiv postarea cu ID-ul 1317717352743487 pe facebook. Postarea promoveaza explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU pentru functia de presedinte al Romaniei, prezentand motive pentru care alegatorii ar trebui sa il voteze, avand un caracter vadit de propaganda electorala. Materialul este difuzat sub forma de reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un public tinta estimat intre 100,001 si 500,000 de persoane, dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorala.
